Isabella Katharina Alix Hortense Anda-Bührle nke a maara dị ka HortenseAnda-Bührre (née Bührle; May 18, 1926 - May 16, 2014) bụ onye ọchụnta ego Switzerland a mụrụ na Germany, onye na-anakọta ihe osise na onye ọrụ ebere. Ọ bụ ada Emil Georg Bührle, onye bụ onye nwe Oerlikon-Bührle na onye nlekọta ogologo oge na onye nlekọta nke Foundation EG Bührle.

A mụrụ Bührle na Zürich, Switzerland na nne na nna German Emil Georg Bührle Na nwunye ya Wilhelmine Charlotte (née Schalk). Ọ nwetara ikike ịbụ nwa amaala Switzerland naanị na 1937 site na nnabata nke nne na nna ya.  Nna ya na mbụ bụ onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na mgbe e mesịrị ọtụtụ ndị nwe igwe ihe metụtara Oerlikon.  Nwanne ya nwoke nke tọrọ ya bụ Dieter Bührle.. Nne ya si n'ezinụlọ ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ nke Magdeburg, nke ga-emecha kwado ọtụtụ n'ime nnweta nke nchegbu ahụ.Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ ezumike nke onwe nke Switzerland, Hochalpins Institut Ftan, na Ftan, Grisons yana St

N'afọ 1956, mgbe nna ya nwụrụ, o ketara oke òkè na nchegbu Oerlikon-Bührle.  N'ikpeazụ, ọ nwere ọtụtụ ndị otu bọọdụ na-arụsi ọrụ ike na Oerlikon, Bally yana IHAG Holding na IHAG Privatbank nwere ma na-achịkwa ya.  Ọ bụkwa onye nwe oke na onye na-emepụta noodle Italy Barilla.. Ọ bụkwa onye nwe ụlọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ Storchen Zürich na Castello del Sole na Ascona, Switzerland.
Anda-Bührle guzobere Géza Anda Foundation n'afọ 1978 iji cheta di ya Géza Anda ma bụrụ onyeisi oche ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ
N'ịkwalite ndị na-eto eto na-akpọ piano, o mere Concours Géza Anda kwa afọ. Ya na nwanne ya nwoke ketara ihe osise nke nna ya nwụrụ anwụ, nke mere ka e guzobe Foundation E
Bührle na Zürich, n'ụlọ ezinụlọ mbụ
Kemgbe Ọktọba 9, 2021, a na-egosipụta ụfọdụ ihe osise na nku ọhụrụ agbakwunyere na Kunsthaus Zürich
Anda-Bührle bụkwa onye otu ndị nlekọta nke Kunsthistorisches Institut Florenz na Florence, Ịtali, Ittingen Charterhouse na Goethe-Stiftung für Kunst und Wissenschaft na Zürich.
N'afọ 1964, Bührle lụrụ onye na-akpọ piano na Hungary bụ Géza Anda. Ha nwere otu nwa nwoke.
Anda-Bührle nwụrụ na Mee 16, 2014, mgbe ọ gbara afọ 87.
